headline: Kimberly-Clark (NYSE:KMB) Teams Up With Giannis For Heartwarming Huggies Campaign
summary: Kimberly-Clark (NYSE:KMB) recently launched a new multi-channel marketing campaign featuring Giannis Antetokounmpo, promoting their Huggies® Little Movers® HuggFit 360° slip-on diaper. This campaign aligns with the company's ongoing social responsibility initiative, donating $100,000 worth of diapers to the Milwaukee Diaper Bank. Despite this impactful launch and charitable effort, the company's share price remained stable over the past week, moving in line with broader market trends, which...
